item.description:
Join environmentalists, the Warren Campaign, and the Sierra Club for a day canvassing in Cambridge!

We need to get a huge turnout for Elizabeth to ensure a win on election day. Please come - and bring your friends!

RSVP here or at http://j.mp/Sierra4Warren.

Also see our Sunday 10/21 canvass in Lexington http://j.mp/Sierra4Warren

Elizabeth is an environmental champion and fighting in a tough race for the U.S. Senate. She's got our endorsement, and with your help we'll push her over the top and on to victory in November.

This will be an exciting opportunity to meet Robin Mann, former Sierra Club National President, who will be at the canvass. With less than a month until the election the stakes couldn't be higher here in Massachusetts and each and every vote is going to count.

Can you join us on October 20 or 21 to win this election for Elizabeth Warren and our environment?

This is being hosted by Sierra Club volunteer Phil Sego.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be there with buttons and tee shirts

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Green Canvass for Elizabeth Warren: Cambridge
